answers.answer: Your typical hospital stay after a c section is about 4 days. Maybe 5. But as long as u are taking your pain medicine after surgery u will be fine. I was up walking later that day. Don't worry. And did the doctor say why you can't have her naturally?
Thanks so much for answering. I've posted a couple times but nobody ever answers me. But yeah he told me that because of my blood pressure was the reason I couldn't have her natural

O ok. I developed severe preeclampsia with my last pregnancy so I understand. And u r welcome. At least u r close to your due date if u do have to deliver soon. I was 25 weeks when I delivered. She is doing great now. I will pray for u. Be strong

Oh wow I couldn't imagine. Yeah It's been pretty rough though but I wouldn't change it for the world. And yeah he said 38 weeks he would be happy but shoot If she was healthy then I'd love to have her now. Me and the finance are nervous but so ready for her to be here. Thank you

question: Heyy all mommies. I'm a ftm and as time gets closer I'm getting really really nervous. Had a lot of problems with high blood pressure which doctor put me on blood pressure pill 3 times a day. Also been checked for toxemia cause my feet, legs, and face swell. BEen put on bedrest. Doctor said that baby girl looks fine. She has a big head. He also said that he would be happy to get me to 38 weeks. Also said I wouldn't be able to have her natural. I've had 2 steroid shots to help develop her lungs. Really nervous bout having a C-section. How long do you stay in the hospital after you have one. HOw sore was you?
title: 34 weeks and 5 days
